name: Total Rendition
storyline: In a bid to overcome your financial difficulties, you have accepted a job at a large Private Military Corporation, marketing its business as "litigation support" in order to circumvent legal hurdles. Under its aegis, you are soon entrusted with looking after the interests of a prominent European old money family in the Dutch seaside resort of Noordwijk aan Zee. However, the thinly veiled facade of hospitality of "Holland's Finest Beach", quickly unravels when self-proclaimed "Anti-Communist" stay-behind armies, thought to have gone dormant with the end of the Cold War, are suddenly re-entering the political stage. In this light, your employer's customers suddenly become suspect, as you fight, sneak or talk your way through various political intrigues thought to be mere conspiracy theories or urban legends...
summary: A first-person immersive sim/action role-playing game set in the seaside resort of Noordwijk aan Zee, where players must investigate a grand conspiracy to install Neo-Fascist governments all across Europe. There is a high degree of interactivity, giving players the opportunity to devise a variety of solutions to any problem encountered.
